author: brycem
body: The new tools\jenkinsutils.psm1 module contains a CmdLet for setting up windows Jenkins slaves (Get-DockerDeps), a CmdLet for fetching the current build for a given tag (Get-LatestPs), and a CmdLet for building a Windows Docker Container image that executes the Directives in the new tools\Dockerfile to Invoke-Pester after the container launches.  Failed results fail the container build. tools\.gitignore updated to ignore the WorkSpace generated for the Docker build.
